tourName: Experience Culture and Top Attractions of Dhaka City
review: Fantastic experience - really immersive tour around Old Dhaka. Our tour guide Afridi was great, really knowledgable and went above and beyond to cater the itinerary around key sights we wanted to visit. As a result we were able to include pretty much everything you could hope to…

tourName: Fantastic way to travel in Bangladesh -7 Day Tour!
review: I just finished ten glorious days of travel in Bangladesh. I couldn't find a lot of information online, so I opted to take a tour. I was traveling solo and Deshighuri had a reasonably priced tour that covered a lot of the places I wanted to visit. I was a little hesitant as I…

tourName: Experience Culture and Top Attractions of Dhaka City
review: I had the most incredible tour of Dhaka with Afridi, in fact the best tour I’ve ever had. He was calm, kind, knowledgeable and flexible to our interests and preferences. His reflections on the sites, in excellent English, really helped to deepen my knowledge of this ancient…
